question: cant eat or drink with a strep throat what else can I do?
question_content: so i have strep throat a really bad case of it and i cant eat or drink anything without it hurting.. ive tried salt water cough drops everything.. its getting to the point where its very difficult to swallow water or any liquid any suggestions on what to do next?1

answers.answer_content: Try eating soft foods. I get strep throat a lot, and I've had it worse than an adult gets it (I'm 13) I ate cold soft foods like yogurt, ice cream, jello, pudding. In that rage. Even though it hurts, you still drink lots of water. Your doctor should have given you some kind of medication for it.
